channel.title: Package on inSileco
channel.description: Recent content in Package on inSileco

item.title: inSilecoMisc 0.4.0 (part 2/2)
item.description: In the first part of this post I introduced several functions available in the package inSilecoMisc. In this post, I keep on introducing features of the package you might find useful!

item.title: inSilecoMisc 0.4.0 (part 1/2)
item.description: inSilecoMisc inSilecoMisc is an R 📦 I have been maintaining for four years now. It was originally designed as a convenient way to share handy functions.

item.title: A few thoughts on R packages
item.description: Jonas Geschke, Ignasi Bartomeus and I have recently released rcites v-1.0.0 on CRAN, a R client for the Species+ API after it has been reviewed by rOpenSci.
